TopicTitle: My under construction kerbal space program blog.

Articles.Content:
I have a lot of work to do, but after only a few posts I decided to release it. You can expect more interesting stories, and the technical post is a VERY rare example of complicated posts that you may not ever see again. Although, I hope it was useful to some of you guys.

Anyway, I\'ll be doing a lot of posts there and the next page I plan to construct is the 'Share your Experiences here' page to make the blog a little more interactive.

Comments can be used, or you can email me, submit your story and have a guarantee it will be posted.

Happy Launching.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.wordpress.com/
I don\'t know if using 'kerbalspaceprogram.wordpress.com' is a good idea... people might mistake it for an official blog.
Didn\'t really think about that. I shall see if I can change the URL.
